data.prayer: Jesus, make the 249,665 people in the state of Brăila who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Brăila, Romania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Brăila, Romania.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Brăila, Romania.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Brăila words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people.
Father, move the 18,096 believers in the state of Brăila to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 18,096 believers in the state of Brăila.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.section_summary:
the state of Brăila, Romania has a population of 285,900.

We estimate Brăila has 18,096 people who might know Jesus, 249,665 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 18,138 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Brăila, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
